metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2980 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
NULL Pointer Dereference in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.0259.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2980` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
vim-athena - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
vim-common - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
vim-gtk3 - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
vim-gui-common - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
vim-motif - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
vim-nox - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
vim-runtime - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
vim-tiny - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
xxd - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.3').
